channel.title: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked

item.title: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Uhm, hold on.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2008, 08:49:23 AM[/size][hr]Something do with:

public void Teleblock()

Mine is:

public void Teleblock() { teleblock = true; sendMessage("A teleblock has been cast on you!"); stillgfx(345, absY, absX); }

So I guess you would need to edit it somehow and add other things. I’ve been working on my server all morning and I can’t really think about this atm. :\

Gl.

A quick way to do it would be to make it so when your teleblocked theres a log out delay.

public void Teleblock() { teleblock = true; sendMessage("A teleblock has been cast on you!"); stillgfx(345, absY, absX); LogoutDelay = 30; }

Meh…

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked

item.title: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“dd, post:2, topic:182183”] case 9154: //Log out if(teleblock == false){ logout(); savemoreinfo(); savecharbackup(); savechar(); } else if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from logging out."); } break;[/quote]
It works

dd:

Do you have a timer on your teleblock? If not you will never be able to log out.

Yes I do.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2008, 08:42:37 AM[/size][hr][quote=“dd, post:5, topic:182183”]Do you have a timer on your teleblock? If not you will never be able to log out.[/quote]
How do I manage the timer? What do I search for?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

[code] case 9154: //Log out
if(teleblock){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
break;
}
logout();
savemoreinfo();
savecharbackup();
savechar();

					break;[/code]

Try that?

item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

[code]				case 9154: //Log out

if(teleblock == false){
logout();
savemoreinfo();
savecharbackup();
savechar();
}
else if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from logging out.”);
}
break;[/code]

item.title: Can't Log out when Tele Blocked
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

I’ve tried everything but this is the only thing that makes sense

if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else {

Is there any way to make it so when your tele blocked you can’t log out?
